trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyValueChanged"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyValueChanged"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyValueChanged> event occurs when the user changes the value of a property, which is specified as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>, in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyValueChanged>evento ocorre quando o utilizador altera o valor de uma propriedade, o que é especificado como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>, no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertyValueChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyValueChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyValueChangedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The item in the grid that changed.
trans-unit.target: O item na grelha que foram alterados.
Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"> </xref> que foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the grid item before it was changed.
trans-unit.target: O valor do item de grelha antes de que foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: This property provides you with the value of the property as it was before the change was applied.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade fornece o valor da propriedade que estava antes da alteração foi aplicada.

trans-unit.source: You can find the new value by querying the property grid with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyValueChangedEventArgs.ChangedItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pode encontrar o novo valor consultando a grelha de propriedades com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyValueChangedEventArgs.ChangedItem%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyValueChangedEventArgs.ChangedItem%2A> especificado

trans-unit.source: A object representing the old value of the property.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o valor da propriedade antigo.
